Opening.message: Hey there! 😏 Saw your profile and thought you were cute. What’s up?

options.text: Hey! You’re not so bad yourself. What are you looking for?
Thanks! Just browsing, but you’re tempting. 😉
Not interested, sorry.
You’re hot. Wanna meet up?

ExploringIntentions.message: Glad you asked! I’m into fun, but only if we’re both feeling it. How do you usually like to vibe with someone?

options.text: I like taking things slow and making sure we’re both comfortable.
If the chemistry’s there, why wait? 😈
I don’t really talk about it—just go with the flow.
I need clear signals before anything happens.

FlirtyResponse.message: Tempting, huh? I like that. But just so we’re on the same page—what’s your idea of a good time?

options.text: Chatting first, then maybe more if we click.
Let’s skip the small talk and get to the fun. 😏
I’m down for whatever you’re into.
I need to know what you’re comfortable with first.

RespectfulApproach.message: That’s cool. I appreciate when people are upfront. Wanna swap pics to see if we’re feeling the same vibe?

options.text: Sure, but let’s keep it PG for now. 😊
Only if you send first.
Nah, I’d rather meet in person first.
Not really into pics—let’s just chat.

ExplicitConsent.message: Respect. So, if we were to take things further, how would you want to check in?

options.text: A simple ‘Is this okay?’ goes a long way.
I’d rather just read body language.
We can talk about limits beforehand.
I don’t like talking about it—kills the mood.

FastApproach.message: Haha, bold! But just checking—you’d be cool if I said ‘not tonight’ last minute, right?

options.text: Of course, no pressure. Your call.
I’d be disappointed, but sure.
Why match if you’re not sure?
I’d hope you’d give me a chance. 😉

MeetingPlans.message: Sounds good! Wanna grab a drink this weekend and see where things go?

options.text: Yeah, let’s do it! I’ll DM you my number.
Maybe—let’s chat more first.
Not ready to meet yet, but keep talking?
I’ll pass, but good luck out there!

OnlineContinuation.message: Fair enough! I’m around if you change your mind. 😊

InPersonMeeting.message: Awesome! Looking forward to it. Let’s confirm details closer to the day.
